effect.sun_moon: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.sun_moon: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
